name: DMMod
savepath: Thanks for playing my mod! Patch 1.06b changelog: decreased Cruel prefix

to 2 from 5 (chance to select Cruel [201-300% enhanced damage] prefix on magic weapons decreased to 2/21 = 9.52% from 5/24 = 20.83%). This only affects the magic Cruel prefix for magic weapons, the rare Cruel prefix for rare weapons is unaffected.

Two sources of half freeze duration now stack into cannot be frozen, shield/boots base damage and strength/dex scaling increased to have parity with other weapons after they were buffed in DMMod 1.00, new

cube recipe for rare/unique weapons/armor, slight changes to magical affixes, lots of bug fixes to Uber monster stats, skills, and other stuff. Some small skill changes and set/unique item stat changes.
